name: Defenders of the Realm VR
description: There is no futuristic weapons and no fancy-shmancy magic powers. In this brutal world, the only power you have is the badass crossbow in your hands and the myriad traps at your disposal. Put your limited resources to good use and repel the barbaric goblin invasion. There are no rules. You have just one mission: destroy them all.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7 Processor: I5 457 Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: Geforce Gtx970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win7 Processor: I7 4570 Memory: 8192 MB RAM Graphics: Geforce Gtx1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
